claims.claim: The pAInt platform saves customers time, effort and money
claims.quote: Named pAInt, this gen AI shopping assistant saves time, effort and money.

claims.claim: pAInt supports Bricorama's goal to reposition its brand as the DIY champion
claims.quote: For Bricorama, pAInt is supporting its goal to reposition its brand as the DIY champion of home improvement projects for French consumers.

claims.claim: pAInt is driving brand awareness and increasing customer loyalty
claims.quote: Ultimately, it's driving brand awareness and increasing customer loyalty.

claims.claim: pAInt showcases the potential for generative AI to enhance customer experience
claims.quote: pAInt has also showcased the potential for generative AI to enhance the customer experience and provide valuable guidance in unique decision-making processes.

claims.claim: pAInt enables Bricorama to offer customers a unique online experience
claims.quote: Ce nouveau service permet à l'enseigne d'offrir à ses clients une expérience unique en ligne et de les accompagner dans la réussite de leurs projets « Do It Yourself ».

claims.claim: pAInt provides a personalized professional response across channels
claims.quote: Nos clients attendent une réponse professionnelle personnalisée, quel que soit le canal qu'ils choisissent. Avec pAInt, nous proposons une expérience en ligne « sur-mesure »

claims.claim: pAInt enables the brand to offer customers a unique online experience and accompany them to successful project completion
claims.quote: This new service enables the brand to offer its customers a unique online experience, and to accompany them to the successful completion of their 'Do-It-Yourself' (DIY) projects.

claims.claim: pAInt offers hyper-relevant retail suggestions to each customer in each decision-making moment
claims.quote: design and deliver a tool that offers hyper-relevant retail suggestions to each customer in each decision-making moment.

claims.claim: Bricorama has stopped the pAInt service for an indefinite period
claims.quote: Bricorama annonce interrompre, « pour une durée indéterminée », son service d'assistance à l'achat de peinture, baptisé pAInt et piloté par IA.
